Image.drawLine|block: draw line in %myImage=variables_get from x %x0 y %y0 to x %x1 y %y1 %c=colorindexpicker
Image.drawRect|block: outline rectangle in %myImage=variables_get at x %x y %y width %w height %h %c=colorindexpicker
Image.fillRect|block: fill rectangle in %myImage=variables_get at x %x y %y width %w height %h %c=colorindexpicker
Image.setPixel|block: set pixel of %myImage=variables_get at x %x y %y to %c=colorindexpicker
image.create|block: create empty image with width %width height %height
